bibl.title: Bilingual Greek-Demotic Documentary Papyri and Hellenization in Ptolemaic Egypt.
Faces of Hellenism. Studies in the History of the Eastern Mediterranean (4th Century B.C. - 5th Century A.D.)
bibl.author: DEPAUW, Mark

bibl.note: Pp. 132-146: Appendix. Catalogue of Bilingual Documents: Greeks Sections in a Demotic Text [1-2]; - Demotic Sections in a Greek Text [3-10]; - Demotic Texts with Greek Autograph Subscriptions [11-20]; - Greek Texts with Demotic Autograph Subscriptions [21-63]; - Demotic Texts with Greek Summaries [64-154]; - Greek Texts with Demotic Summaries [155-187]; - Demotic Texts with Related Greek Secondary Use; - Greek Texts with Related Demotic Secondary Use [188-202].
